II. Pastoral Charge - Titus in Crete. For this reason I left you in Crete so that you might set right what remains to be done and appoint presbyters in every town, as I directed you,
as I hear of the love and the faith you have in the Lord Jesus and for all the holy ones,

II. God As Light - God Is Light. Now this is the message that we have heard from him and proclaim to you: God is light, and in him there is no darkness at all.
